attributes.title: Hi, I'm Ruby!
attributes.caption: Hi, I'm Ruby, and I'm so excited to be here with you!
attributes.description: Hi, I'm Ruby, and I'm so excited to be here with you!

attributes.title: My First Convention! RTX 2023
attributes.caption: I went to my first convention and it was AMAZING!!!!
attributes.description: I went to my first convention and it was AMAZING!!!! I got to meet so many people and I can't wait to do it again! What convention should I go to next!

attributes.title: Ruby is for Falltober!

attributes.description: With October come spooky season and Ruby has a whole lot of plans.
